title: Sculpting a Dragon Scroll Asset in ZBrush - DigitalTutors
description:
Sculpting a Dragon Scroll Asset in ZBrush <a href="
http://www.digitaltutors.com/tutorial/1651-Sculpting-a-Dragon-Scroll-Asset-in-ZBrush" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.digitaltutors.com/tutorial/1651-Sculpting-a-Dragon-Scroll-Asset-in-ZBrush</a>

Released Jun 23, 2014
ZBrush 4R6, Photoshop CC
3h 36m
Project Files Included

In this training we'll cover how to create a detailed prop within ZBrush using key features like Radial symmetry, DynaMesh, sculpting brushes, Insert Mesh brushes, and NoiseMaker. Using these tools we will learn how to efficiently and quickly create details that will really make your sculpt stand out.

By the end of this tutorial you will have created a detailed Dragon Scroll asset.

Tutor for this course: Pierre Rogers, guest tutor
Pierre is a Chicago native freelance character artist with a background in character design and graphic art. His interest in character art was cultivated by a video game enriched youth. Pierre has a blend of self taught and formal training. Pierre's goal is to continue learning and sharpening his skills, as well as sharing the craft he has chosen and loves, which is bringing characters to life.
